description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Coal Mines, their dangers and means of safety: to which is added the Report of the South Shields Committee appointed to investigate the causes of accidents in Coal Mines, with plans and appendix; together with extracts from the Minutes of Evidence taken before the Parliamentary Committee on Coal Mines, in 1852" Author: MATHER, James - Member of the Royal Physical Society Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 7105.f.26."
